item.title: Smart Home Intro
item.description: Introduction This series of blog posts is my laboratory notebook as I try, and hopefully succeed, in upgrading a 15 year old Central European house into a smart home. Construction materials The house is 15 years old. It is a well built central european house, with a two-shell external walls made from reinforced concrete and bricks, internal walls made from brick or reinforced concrete and ceilings made exclusively from reinforced concrete.
